simbad.sim
Class SensorMatrix

java.lang.Object
  simbad.sim.SensorData
      simbad.sim.SensorMatrix
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class SensorMatrix
extends SensorData

A luminance Matrix : a 2d array of normalized luminances. It can be obtained from a vision sensor (Eye).
